Yehova! Ha! Achuluka nanga akundisautsa ine!Akundiukira ine ndi ambiri.
Ambiri amati kwa moyo wanga,alibe chipulumutso mwa Mulungu.
Ndipo Inu Yehova, ndinu chikopa changa;ulemerero wanga, ndi wondiweramutsa mutu wanga.
Ndifuula kwa Yehova ndi mau anga,ndipo andiyankha m'phiri lake loyera.
Ndinagona ine pansi, ndinagona tulo;ndinauka; pakuti Yehova anandichirikiza.
Sindidzaopa unyinji wa anthu akundizinga ine.
Ukani Yehova; ndipulumutseni, Mulungu wanga!Pakuti mwapanda adani anga onse patsaya;mwawathyola mano oipawo.
Chipulumutso ncha Yehova;dalitso lanu likhale pa anthu anu.
